description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，中共元老习仲勋的妻子，中共中央总书记习近平的母亲。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party, wife of CCP elder Xi Zhongxun, and mother of CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，曾任国务院副总理、中共中央书记处书记和全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the Chinese Communist Party, he served as Vice Premier of the State Council, Secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat, and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋与齐心的长子，自2012年11月起出任中共中央总书记和中央军委主席，成为中华人民共和国第五代最高领导人。
description.en: The eldest son of Xi Zhongxun and Qi Xin, he has served as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and Chairman of the Central Military Commission since November 2012, becoming the fifth-generation paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋与齐心的长女。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Xi Zhongxun and Qi Xin.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋与齐心的次女。
description.en: The second daughter of Xi Zhongxun and Qi Xin.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋与齐心的次子。
description.en: The second son of Xi Zhongxun and Qi Xin.

description.zh-cn: 齐心的姐姐。
description.en: Qi Xin's elder sister.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间，由中国共产党领导的常规军队。
description.en: A regular army led by the Chinese Communist Party during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

zh-cn: 抗日军政大学第一分校
en: First Branch School of the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University

description.zh-cn: 中国人民抗日军事政治大学在抗日战争时期的分校之一。
description.en: One of the branch schools of the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

en: Central Party School of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会轮训和培训中国共产党的高中级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部的学校。
description.en: A school that trains senior and mid-level leading cadres and Marxist theorists of the Chinese Communist Party for the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 位于陕西省延安市的一所大学。
description.en: A university located in Yan'an, Shaanxi province.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级将领，曾任抗日军政大学校长。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese Communist Party, he once served as the president of the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，文化大革命的核心人物。
description.en: A former key leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, and a central figure in the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，为贯彻毛泽东《五七指示》、对党政机关干部、科技人员、大专院校教师进行分期分批劳动的场所。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, these were places where cadres from party and government organs, scientific and technical personnel, and university teachers were sent in batches to perform manual labor in accordance with Mao Zedong's May Seventh Directive.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国第一代主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: One of the first-generation key leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, he served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国第二代主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央主席和中共中央总书记。
description.en: One of the second-generation key leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, he served as Chairman of the CCP Central Committee and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the Chinese Communist Party, he served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，被普遍认为是“改革开放的总设计师”。
description.en: The core of the second-generation central leadership of the Chinese Communist Party, widely regarded as the 'chief architect of reform and opening up'.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪50年代至70年代末在中国发生的，动员城市知识青年到农村地区定居和劳动的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in China from the 1950s to the late 1970s that mobilized urban educated youth to settle and work in rural areas.

description.zh-cn: 齐心的父亲，曾在冯玉祥和傅作义的部队任职。
description.en: Qi Xin's father, who served in the forces of Feng Yuxiang and Fu Zuoyi.

description.zh-cn: 齐心的母亲。
description.en: Qi Xin's mother.

description.zh-cn: 齐心的弟弟。
description.en: Qi Xin's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 一起发生在中国1962年的一起政治事件，导致包括习仲勋在内的大量官员受到清洗。
description.en: A political incident that occurred in China in 1962, leading to the purge of a large number of officials, including Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 中国河北省保定市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Baoding City, Hebei Province, China.

zh-cn: 北平市立第一女子中学

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市的一所中学。
description.en: A middle school located in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古国政治家，曾长期担任蒙古人民革命党总书记和部长会议主席。
description.en: A Mongolian politician who served for a long time as the General Secretary of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party and Chairman of the Council of Ministers.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国及中华人民共和国军事将领，国民革命军高级将领。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China and the People's Republic of China, and a high-ranking general in the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 1963年至1966年间，在中国农村地区开展的社会主义教育运动。
description.en: A socialist education movement carried out in rural areas of China from 1963 to 1966.

relationships.target: 抗日军政大学第一分校

description.zh-cn: 在延安大学中学部学习。
description.en: Studied at the middle school division of Yan'an University.

description.zh-cn: 1943年冬天，时任抗大校长的何长工写信向习仲勋介绍了齐心，促成了他们的婚姻。
description.en: In the winter of 1943, He Changgong, then president of the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University, wrote a letter to Xi Zhongxun introducing Qi Xin, which led to their marriage.

description.zh-cn: 1952年，齐心与丈夫习仲勋一同接待了访华的蒙古领导人泽登巴尔及其夫人。
description.en: In 1952, Qi Xin, along with her husband Xi Zhongxun, received the visiting Mongolian leader Yumjaagiin Tsedenbal and his wife.

description.zh-cn: 1952年，习仲勋与妻子齐心一同接待了访华的蒙古领导人泽登巴尔及其夫人。
description.en: In 1952, Xi Zhongxun, along with his wife Qi Xin, received the visiting Mongolian leader Yumjaagiin Tsedenbal and his wife.

description.zh-cn: 因《刘志丹》案，习仲勋遭到清洗、隔离审查和下放劳动。
description.en: Due to the Liu Zhidan case, Xi Zhongxun was purged, placed under isolated investigation, and sent to do manual labor.

description.zh-cn: 在丈夫习仲勋遭到清洗后，齐心于1963年主动要求参加“四清运动”。
description.en: After her husband Xi Zhongxun was purged, Qi Xin volunteered to participate in the 'Four Cleanups Movement' in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，齐心因未与丈夫习仲勋划清界限而受到审查，被列入黑名单，并在五七干校劳动七年。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Qi Xin was investigated for not drawing a clear line with her husband Xi Zhongxun, was placed on a blacklist, and spent seven years performing manual labor at a May Seventh Cadre School.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，康生将齐心列入500人黑名单。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Kang Sheng placed Qi Xin on a blacklist of 500 people.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，齐心在五七干校劳动7年。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Qi Xin performed manual labor at a May Seventh Cadre School for seven years.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，齐心被迫在批斗会上批斗儿子习近平；并且在习近平从下放地逃回北京后，为避免被牵连，向领导举报了他，导致习近平被送去劳动改造。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Qi Xin was forced to denounce her son Xi Jinping at a struggle session; furthermore, after Xi Jinping escaped from his rural assignment back to Beijing, she reported him to the authorities to avoid being implicated, leading to Xi Jinping being sent for labor reform.

description.zh-cn: 1972年，周恩来在收到齐心的信后作出批复，安排她和子女见到了被关押的习仲勋，并帮助解决了他们的生活困难。
description.en: In 1972, after receiving a letter from Qi Xin, Zhou Enlai gave instructions to arrange for her and her children to meet the imprisoned Xi Zhongxun and helped solve their living difficulties.

description.zh-cn: 在齐心为丈夫复出一事求助时，时任中共中央组织部部长的胡耀邦指引她去找王震，最终促成了习仲勋的复出。
description.en: When Qi Xin sought help for her husband's political rehabilitation, Hu Yaobang, then head of the CCP's Organization Department, guided her to seek help from Wang Zhen, which ultimately led to Xi Zhongxun's return to work.

description.zh-cn: 受齐心所托，王震向邓小平为习仲勋说情，促成了习仲勋的复出。
description.en: At Qi Xin's request, Wang Zhen pleaded with Deng Xiaoping on behalf of Xi Zhongxun, which led to Xi's political rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 作为知识青年，习近平在“上山下乡”运动中被下放到陕北梁家河村插队。
description.en: As an educated youth during the Down to the Countryside Movement, Xi Jinping was sent to work in Liangjiahe Village in northern Shaanxi.
